YDL112W	2'-O-ribose methyltransferase, catalyzes the ribose methylation of the guanosine nucleotide at position 18 of tRNAs

YDL119C	Putative mitochondrial transport protein  GFP-fusion protein is induced in response to the DNA-damaging agent MMS  the authentic, non-tagged protein is detected in purified mitochondria

YKL213C	WD repeat protein required for ubiquitin-mediated protein degradation, forms complex with Cdc48p, plays a role in controlling cellular ubiquitin concentration  also promotes efficient NHEJ in postdiauxic/stationary phase
